title: league newest( and cutest) champion: Zoe aspect of twilight

replies.body: So, her Ultimate is literally just to jump through a portal while basically rooting herself, allowing anyone with half a brain to set up deadly Killshots on her exiting position?

“Briefly teleport to a targeted position, then teleport back. During the teleport you can use abilities and attack normally, and see over walls. However, you won't be able to move“
I want to see how attacking works during the port cause all I see now is a glorified taunt

She can port point blank to someone and hit them with her sleep bubble. Also the cast range of her Q2 is based on a radius around her so she can Q behind her, then Ult forward and that allows her to extend the range of her Q2 which does more damage the farther in travels. She can also use it to pick up summoner spells and item active orbs in her area. Cooldown is 10/8/6s as she tranks up her ult. She can also use it to catch someone low on health with her passive proc.
Hey Reav3 could I ask how Zoe's W interacts with TP, being the only long range summoner, does it drop the shard where the target starts or finishes teleporting too
Starts
Thanks Reav3, CertainlyT's come back to making original champs is sure a spectacle but since you mentioned that the teams are merged, Champ Up and Design, does that mean he can also work on VGUs too

He is currently working on very early ideation for a VGU. 

:)
Swain's VGU, Irelia's VGU, or a new unknown VGU that you can't discuss about yet?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Early Ideation so it's currently unknown and might not even see the light of day.
Hope its Pantheon. I know you cant say anything

I know that he's wanted to do Rammus before Warwick's VGU was even live.

I say it's either him or a second round with Mordekaiser.

I have seriously high hopes from Certainly regarding VGUs since Warwick turned out to be a surprisingly great success. And I really wanna play Zoe, too.

Hoping that whoever it is passes ideation! :>

Oh please please PLEASE let it be Rammus.
After seeing this character study page
https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/001/236/322/large/david-ko-4-2-1000.jpg?1442759349

I want this to happen so badly!

Hello Riot :) I had some thoughts on a Nunu Rework. My idea would be to use the Yeti more by being able to mount and dismount it. If you have the Yeti dismount he should have an HP Bar like Tibbers and be able to attack normally.

mount:
Q remains the old one
W should be a roar of the opponent Fear
E the Yeti forms a big ball and can throw it onto a marked area
R remains the old one

dismount:
Q is a dash forward (he curls up)
W is a snow wall that melts like Anivia's W
E remains the same only that she is now a skillshot and the longer she flies the higher the slow and dmg
R is always available and lets the Yeti come to you

He is said to be a jungler who works great with the Yeti in Jungle without Yeti, he has little chance to survive. For the perfect gank he has to dismount and then use the Q to get to the opponent then place the W and maybe use the E for the dmg and slow (call the yeti with R). Mount the Yeti again and then use the W if the opponent is still alive to knock the E behind.
I hope you like the idea.

I really like that idea of using the Yeti as a mount and having his ult be getting on it.  It'd make him unique as both a mounted character and a 2-form character AND he'd be a unique pet.  The kit isn't perfect but I love the idea.

I'm Late to the Party but reav3 Please let it be nunu, I'm begging you please. Nunu deserves the spot reav3. I'll do whatever you want even if its gruesome or sucking your birdie. but please let it be nunu. 

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
I pray to God the 4 polygon abomination known as Nunu is that VGU (and that it gets released).
Oh shoot, now how will I be able to brace myself for Jag's next trainwreck? ):
Oh boy oh boy oh boy

May I ask what happens if she gets CC'ed after the first jump?
Is it buffered like Tristana, or would it take effect?
What's the mana cost on it?

50 according to Surrender@20

So rather cheap really.
Hmm, I suspect those numbers will need adjustment.

Out of curiosity does her ult break tower aggro?  What about projectiles already targeting her?

If she is under turret and uses it will she break aggro, and if she uses it to jump under turret does she take one turret shot or none?

She is a mobile burst mage with pseudo artillery range.
There have to be _some_ downsides in her kit, don't you think?

I think the fact that she only has her Q and autos/passive for damage is going to help keep her in check.  Obviously that's excluding something like a protobelt pickup, but you usually see more than one damaging ability on a "burst mage".  There's definitely a skill curve to her Q too.
That Q probably has a short CD and I would wait for the numbers, did you see how much that spell chunked in some videos? xD
there is the aforementioned telegraphing of her position with her ult

That's what I was talking about.
That champion gets alot of tools in the hand, there have to be weaknesses in her system to counterbalance that.

One of these weaknesses is that you will know where she is exactly after her ult. And then you can nuke her.
Hell, that ability has 6 seconds base CD at rank 3. Of course it has a downside.

I think everyone is overexaggerating her mobility. Her ult is just a glorified range increase, and her W speedup is dependent on summoners. If she has no flash of her own or summoners to pick up, she's a sitting duck.

I just wish it would tell us something about her lore.
I want to know what's up with her.

Lore will be coming.

i hope soraka too. don't leave the star child behind. This is a great opportunity for soraka.

What's happening when we use ult + zhonya Or  ult + qss ?

Can we root zoe once she get out from her second ult portal? If not, riots will probably nerf this {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
when is zoe avaible again on the pbe server??
You can't replace Flash with her R as she must blink back after 1s

jeeze her eyeballs look like they are going to pop out of the socket

the thing im most interested to see is the lore

how on earth did pantheons squad die to get on top of the mountain as well as taric struggling to even climb it  meanwhile a little girl managed to get up there

> how on earth did pantheons squad die to get on top of the mountain as well as taric struggling to even climb it  meanwhile a little girl managed to get up there

because they are only infused with an Aspect. She's a literal Aspect. she isn't infused with one

“Don't be fooled by her childish appearance—Zoe is an ancient being, a cosmic messenger of Targon."

This implies that she is an actual celestial being and not a vessel 
Which sounds confusing really as it questions why other aspects need vessels and not her
On the other hand this may mean she’s been an aspect for a long time and mean ,like ascended, aspects can live forever so long as their bodies aren’t destroyed
oh thats wild, that wasnt posted yet when i commented i guess that makes sense as to why her personality is so different than the other targon champs

i disagree with this part,

> like ascended, aspects can live forever so long as their bodies aren’t destroyed

as i know, ascended can still die but won't die like us living beings. Beings where there is a limitation to our body/ can die with a natural death. But aspects are diff, they're immortal beings.
{{champion:1}} No.
Can't help but find it funny that you're using the SG Lux emote yet she hates her guts.
